thread.title: If You Have No Symptoms, Do You Really Need a Colonoscopy?
thread.title_full: If You Have No Symptoms, Do You Really Need a Colonoscopy?

author: Cancer Care Team
title: If You Have No Symptoms, Do You Really Need a Colonoscopy?
text:
You may think symptoms such as abdominal cramping or a change in bowel habits will warn you that colorectal cancer is developing. Discover the truth about how colorectal cancer develops from colorectal surgeon James Church, MD .

The post If You Have No Symptoms, Do You Really Need a Colonoscopy? appeared first on Health Essentials from Cleveland Clinic .
